Text.Page:
Miserable wendigos! I ordered several barrels of fortified Allemantheian silver wine, a favorite among the soldiers around hereâ€”took a lot of horse-trading. Last night, the wendigos raided our supply cache. What do you think they took?

That wine is for my men, and I intend for them to enjoy it.

Hunt through Wendigo's Howl and retrieve those barrels. I will personally compensate you for your time.

Well done!

You found all there was to find, I expect. I'm sure the wendigos drank the rest.

In any case, thank you.
Find those wine barrels. If you kill a few wendigos in the process, all the better!
